{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "63acaddd",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# Example of informal benchmarking"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 85,
   "id": "e17bda7d",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from sensemakr import sensemakr\n",
    "from sensemakr import ovb_bounds\n",
    "from sensemakr.ovb_plots import *\n",
    "from sensemakr.sensitivity_stats import *\n",
    "from sensemakr.bias_functions import *\n",
    "import statsmodels.api as sm\n",
    "import statsmodels.formula.api as smf\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import pandas as pd"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 87,
   "id": "63514371",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "The autoreload extension is already loaded. To reload it, use:\n",
      "  %reload_ext autoreload\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "%load_ext autoreload"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 88,
   "id": "b565042d",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "%autoreload 2"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 40,
   "id": "80bc8ae5",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "def resid_maker(n,df):\n",
    "    N=np.random.normal(0,1,n)\n",
    "    form='N~' +'+'.join(df.columns)\n",
    "    df['N']=N\n",
    "    model=smf.ols(formula=form,data=df).fit()\n",
    "    e = model.resid\n",
    "    e = (e-np.mean(e))/np.std(e)\n",
    "    return(e)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 41,
   "id": "3e084008",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# simulates data\n",
    "n=100\n",
    "X=np.random.normal(0,1,n)\n",
    "X=(X-np.mean(X))/np.std(X)\n",
    "Z=resid_maker(n,pd.DataFrame({'x':X}))\n",
    "D=X+Z+resid_maker(n,pd.DataFrame({'x':X,'z':Z}))\n",
    "Y=X+Z+resid_maker(n,pd.DataFrame({'x':X,'z':Z,'d':D}))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 43,
   "id": "0722086a",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "df=pd.DataFrame({'Y':Y,'X':X,'Z':Z,'D':D})\n",
    "model_ydx=smf.ols(formula='Y~D+X',data=df).fit()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 49,
   "id": "ab023898",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<table class=\"simpletable\">\n",
       "<caption>OLS Regression Results</caption>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Dep. Variable:</th>            <td>Y</td>        <th>  R-squared:         </th> <td>   0.500</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Model:</th>                   <td>OLS</td>       <th>  Adj. R-squared:    </th> <td>   0.490</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Method:</th>             <td>Least Squares</td>  <th>  F-statistic:       </th> <td>   48.50</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Date:</th>             <td>Sun, 14 Nov 2021</td> <th>  Prob (F-statistic):</th> <td>2.51e-15</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Time:</th>                 <td>16:59:41</td>     <th>  Log-Likelihood:    </th> <td> -162.17</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>No. Observations:</th>      <td>   100</td>      <th>  AIC:               </th> <td>   330.3</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Df Residuals:</th>          <td>    97</td>      <th>  BIC:               </th> <td>   338.1</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Df Model:</th>              <td>     2</td>      <th>                     </th>     <td> </td>   \n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Covariance Type:</th>      <td>nonrobust</td>    <th>                     </th>     <td> </td>   \n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "<table class=\"simpletable\">\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "      <td></td>         <th>coef</th>     <th>std err</th>      <th>t</th>      <th>P>|t|</th>  <th>[0.025</th>    <th>0.975]</th>  \n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Intercept</th> <td>-2.776e-17</td> <td>    0.124</td> <td>-2.23e-16</td> <td> 1.000</td> <td>   -0.247</td> <td>    0.247</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>D</th>         <td>    0.5000</td> <td>    0.088</td> <td>    5.686</td> <td> 0.000</td> <td>    0.325</td> <td>    0.675</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>X</th>         <td>    0.5000</td> <td>    0.152</td> <td>    3.283</td> <td> 0.001</td> <td>    0.198</td> <td>    0.802</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "<table class=\"simpletable\">\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Omnibus:</th>       <td> 5.345</td> <th>  Durbin-Watson:     </th> <td>   1.918</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Prob(Omnibus):</th> <td> 0.069</td> <th>  Jarque-Bera (JB):  </th> <td>   6.813</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Skew:</th>          <td> 0.200</td> <th>  Prob(JB):          </th> <td>  0.0332</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "<tr>\n",
       "  <th>Kurtosis:</th>      <td> 4.214</td> <th>  Cond. No.          </th> <td>    2.41</td>\n",
       "</tr>\n",
       "</table><br/><br/>Notes:<br/>[1] Standard Errors assume that the covariance matrix of the errors is correctly specified."
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "<class 'statsmodels.iolib.summary.Summary'>\n",
       "\"\"\"\n",
       "                            OLS Regression Results                            \n",
       "==============================================================================\n",
       "Dep. Variable:                      Y   R-squared:                       0.500\n",
       "Model:                            OLS   Adj. R-squared:                  0.490\n",
       "Method:                 Least Squares   F-statistic:                     48.50\n",
       "Date:                Sun, 14 Nov 2021   Prob (F-statistic):           2.51e-15\n",
       "Time:                        16:59:41   Log-Likelihood:                -162.17\n",
       "No. Observations:                 100   AIC:                             330.3\n",
       "Df Residuals:                      97   BIC:                             338.1\n",
       "Df Model:                           2                                         \n",
       "Covariance Type:            nonrobust                                         \n",
       "==============================================================================\n",
       "                 coef    std err          t      P>|t|      [0.025      0.975]\n",
       "------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n",
       "Intercept  -2.776e-17      0.124  -2.23e-16      1.000      -0.247       0.247\n",
       "D              0.5000      0.088      5.686      0.000       0.325       0.675\n",
       "X              0.5000      0.152      3.283      0.001       0.198       0.802\n",
       "==============================================================================\n",
       "Omnibus:                        5.345   Durbin-Watson:                   1.918\n",
       "Prob(Omnibus):                  0.069   Jarque-Bera (JB):                6.813\n",
       "Skew:                           0.200   Prob(JB):                       0.0332\n",
       "Kurtosis:                       4.214   Cond. No.                         2.41\n",
       "==============================================================================\n",
       "\n",
       "Notes:\n",
       "[1] Standard Errors assume that the covariance matrix of the errors is correctly specified.\n",
       "\"\"\""
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 49,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "model_ydx.summary()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 50,
   "id": "f125de24",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# fits treatment regression\n",
    "model_dx=smf.ols(formula='D~X',data=df).fit()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 55,
   "id": "0aece9df",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# computes observed partial R2 of X\n",
    "r2yx_d=partial_r2(model_ydx,covariates='X')\n",
    "r2dx=partial_r2(model_dx,covariates='X')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 57,
   "id": "21e72ff8",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "informal_adjusted_estimate=adjusted_estimate(model=model_ydx,treatment=\"D\",r2dz_x=r2dx,r2yz_dx=r2yx_d)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 82,
   "id": "7a12be71",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x432 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# draws sensitivity contours\n",
    "ovb_contour_plot(model=model_ydx,treatment=\"D\",lim=0.6)\n",
    "\n",
    "# adds informal benchmark\n",
    "add_bound_to_contour(r2dz_x=r2dx,r2yz_dx=r2yx_d,bound_value=informal_adjusted_estimate,\n",
    "                     bound_label='Informal benchmark')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 91,
   "id": "f804a5e8",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# compute formal bounds\n",
    "formal_bound=ovb_bounds.ovb_bounds(model=model_ydx,treatment='D',benchmark_covariates=\"X\",kd=1,ky=1)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 92,
   "id": "b9edb72b",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x432 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# contour plot\n",
    "ovb_contour_plot(model=model_ydx,treatment=\"D\",lim=0.6)\n",
    "add_bound_to_contour(r2dz_x=r2dx,r2yz_dx=r2yx_d,bound_value=informal_adjusted_estimate,\n",
    "                     bound_label='Informal benchmark')\n",
    "add_bound_to_contour(bounds=formal_bound,\n",
    "                     bound_label='Proper bound')"
   ]
  }
